topic.title: Am I missing something?
topic.body: How is there no search function here? Seems to defeat the purpose, like this site is just a stream of thoughts that never amount to anything profound because we're only seeing new posts.

1610501785_12BSeHrHaz9gyid4AFkYdFYRcmFsS.body: I agree, just joined. For any veterans in here, what users should I follow? There doesn't appear to be any icon to click for searching specific posts, only users. If this is "reddit-like", where is "all" or "popular" or their equivalent? I'm only seeing "new".
